text: Glensworth Elizee (born 9 November 1989) is an international footballer from Dominica, who plays as a midfielder for Portsmouth Bombers and the Dominica national football team. ==International== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Dominica's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" !
